title: Moving AI governance forward
summary: OpenAI and other leading AI labs are making voluntary commitments to enhance the safety, security, and trustworthiness of AI technology and services. These commitments include internal and external red-teaming of models, information sharing on trust and safety risks, cybersecurity measures, incentivizing the discovery of vulnerabilities, developing mechanisms to identify AI-generated content, publicly reporting model capabilities and limitations, prioritizing research on societal risks, and deploying AI systems to address societal challenges. These commitments aim to promote responsible AI development and governance and will remain in effect until regulations covering similar issues are implemented.
